detectors.description:
EthercentToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#78-83) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#80)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
EthercentToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#85-91) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#86)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#88)

detectors.description: Variable EthercentToken._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#40) is not in mixedCase

EthercentToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#50-58) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 100000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#54)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#8)
	- EthercentToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#60-62)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#9)
	- EthercentToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#64-66)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- EthercentToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#68-70)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#10)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#11)
	- EthercentToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#78-83)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#12)
	- EthercentToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#72-76)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#28)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EthercentToken.sol#28-30)
